attributes.background: Enforce ID verification in order for a user to gain access to porn sites. Sites would require that a valid ID shows that a user trying to gain access is 18years or older.

rejection.details:
Ofcom requires all services allowing pornography to implement highly effective age assurance by July 2025. They have also published a list of what photo ID should be allowed. 

Ofcom is opening an enforcement program to monitor and assess compliance with the requirements to implement highly effective age assurance.
